mapper.update: update oms_order_setting set flash_order_overtime = #{flashOrderOvertime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, normal_order_overtime = #{normalOrderOvertime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, confirm_overtime = #{confirmOvertime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finish_overtime = #{finishOvertime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment_overtime = #{commentOvertime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, flash_order_overtime, normal_order_overtime, confirm_overtime, finish_overtime, comment_overtime from oms_order_setting where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, flash_order_overtime, normal_order_overtime, confirm_overtime, finish_overtime, comment_overtime from oms_order_setting
